User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11

If I close all toolbars and leave only the tab bar, with urlbar on it and needed me buttons (see screen shot), appears this line on tabs:

http://img-fotki.yandex.ru/get/5602/pnovicov.12/0_4d203_2f97ac6e_orig

If the navigation toolbar or bookmarks toolbar is open, line gone:

http://img-fotki.yandex.ru/get/5108/pnovicov.12/0_4d204_9e649a06_orig

This is note happen in beta 10, its appear when i updated to beta 11.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: pnovicov@ya.ru
